info.author: Imri Goldberg
info.description:
Master creates a rule, players need to guess the rule.
Rules are applied to lists of integers (called koans), for example under the
rule "for each x holds x%2==0" the list [0,2,6] is valid. Players first try out
koans, and then try to guess the rule.
info.name: PyKoan
info.html_description: Master creates a rule, players need to guess the rule. Rules are applied to lists of integers (called koans), for example under the rule “for each x holds x%2==0” the list [0,2,6] is valid. Players first try out koans, and then try to guess the rule.
